body:
i'm seeing this sort of thing with 4.0 too.  the phonie gem, for example, does 

```
require 'active_model/naming'
require 'active_model/translation'
require 'active_model/validations'
```

with rails 4.0 in my gemfile i sometimes hit:

```
beezo:my-proj ej$ bundle exec irb
2.0.0-p0 :001 > require 'active_model/naming'
NoMethodError: undefined method `delegate' for ActiveModel::Name:Class
	from /Users/ej/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-p0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/naming.rb:131:in `<class:Name>'
	from /Users/ej/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-p0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/naming.rb:5:in `<module:ActiveModel>'
	from /Users/ej/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-p0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/naming.rb:4:in `<top (required)>'
	from (irb):1:in `require'
	from (irb):1
	from /Users/ej/.rvm/rubies/ruby-2.0.0-p0/bin/irb:16:in `<main>'
```

and other places hit:

```
/home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/validations/format.rb:4:in `<module:Validations>': uninitialized constant ActiveModel::Validations::EachValidator (NameError)
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/validations/format.rb:3:in `<module:ActiveModel>'
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/validations/format.rb:1:in `<top (required)>'
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/validations.rb:379:in `block in <top (required)>'
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/validations.rb:379:in `each'
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/activemodel-4.0.0/lib/active_model/validations.rb:379:in `<top (required)>'
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/phonie-2.0.1/lib/phonie/phone.rb:3:in `<top (required)>'
        from /home/ej/my-proj/shared/bundle/ruby/2.0.0/gems/phonie-2.0.1/lib/phonie.rb:3:in `<top (required)>'
```

just requiring all of active_model fixes it, as per https://github.com/wmoxam/phonie/pull/12
